headline: Capital One Financial Corporation (COF) Completes $35.3B Acquisition of Discover
summary: Capital One Financial Corporation (NYSE:COF) has announced that it has completed the acquisition of Discover Financial Services for $35.3 billion. The company entered into a definitive agreement to acquire Discover on February 19, 2024, which received approval from the Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System in April this year. headline: Capital One Finishes Discover Acquisition After 15-Month Journey
summary: (Bloomberg) -- Almost 15 months after its announcement, Capital One Financial Corp.’s takeover of Discover Financial Services was officially completed on Sunday, creating the largest credit-card issuer by loan volume in the US.Most Read from BloombergHow a Highway Became San Francisco’s Newest ParkAmerica, ‘Nation of Porches’Maryland’s Credit Rating Gets Downgraded as Governor Blames Trump NJ Transit Train Engineers Strike, Disrupting Travel to NYCNYC Commuters Brace for Chaos as NJ Transit Stri

headline: Capital One Completes Acquisition of Discover
summary: MCLEAN, Va., May 18, 2025--Capital One Financial Corporation (NYSE: COF) today announced that it has completed its acquisition of Discover Financial Services.
